DOC.brief_title: Which One Should Treated Setting Acute ST Elevation Myocardial Infarction - Culprit Lesion Culprit Vessel ?
DOC.detailed_description: Patient selection : This multi-centre retrospective study include patient 3 high-volume primary PCI centre Turkey . A total number 5512 patient underwent emergent PCI acute STEMI January 2011 December 2013 . From patient population , patient look presence additional lesion culprit lesion ( CL ) . Additional lesion define presence angiographically severe ( ≥70 % ) lesion CL either proximal distal coronary artery distal flow observe commonly result guide-wire passage PTCA total occlusion . Exclusion criterion : - Presence LMCA lesion - Cardiogenic shock - Previous CABG operation - Decision CABG operation primary PCI - Severe valvular disease include aortic stenosis mitral insufficiency - Severe kidney disease ( serum creatinine > 2.5 mg/dl patient maintenance hemodialysis ) - Rejection second PCI patient index event The eligible patient retrospectively seek database relevant hospital . The basal characteristic patient like age , sex , presence coronary risk factor ( smoking , hypertension , diabetes mellitus hyperlipidemia ) , vital sign location STEMI admission note . The emergent coronary angiogram patient examine several angiographic post-PCI feature define detail follow section address . Follow-up patient succeed either phone call , routine polyclinic visit database hospital . Study group : Patients group 2 accord PCI strategy ; culprit vessel ( CV ) group include patient underwent emergent PCI severe ( ≥70 stenosis CAG ) lesion culprit vessel culprit lesion ( CL ) group include patient underwent emergency PCI CL stag PCI 2 week additional lesion CV . Both group undergo stag PCI severe lesion ( ) non-culprit vessel ( ) necessary different session 28 day index event . Staged PCI prefer strategy group necessary stag PCI find least non-inferior strategy several study [ 3 , 4 , 10 , 13 ] . Definition acute STEMI : The criterion diagnosis STEMI : ( 1 ) chest pain within 24 h admission last 30 min relieve sublingual nitroglycerin ; ( 2 ) ST-segment elevation electrocardiogram ; ( 3 ) elevate serum creatine kinase ( CK ) troponin level . Emergent coronary angiography PCI procedure : All patient routinely treat heparin , clopidogrel , aspirin , statin angiotensin convert enzyme inhibitor angiotensin II receptor blocker unless contraindicate . Coronary angioplasty stent implantation perform accord standard percutaneous technique femoral artery . Standard selective coronary angiography least 4 view leave coronary system 2 view right coronary artery perform use Judgkins technique . All patient diagnosis acute STEMI underwent emergent PCI bare metal drug-eluting stent . Stent implantation perform inflation pressure 10 16 atm . When suboptimal stent deployment observe , angiographic optimization perform use high-pressure noncompliant balloon dilatation achieve < 20 % residual stenosis visual estimation . Angiographic no-reflow phenomenon diagnose significant coronary flow decrease ( Thrombolysis In Myocardial Infarction [ TIMI ] grade < 3 flow ) without mechanical obstruction notice final cineangiograms obtain completion PCI procedure [ 14 , 15 ] . Staged PCI : Staged PCI procedure perform either culprit vessel CL group and/or non-culprit lesion ( ) non-culprit vessel ( ) group 14 day index event . In CL group , perform culprit non-culprit vessel intervention . In CV group , perform non-culprit vessel necessary . Follow-up patient : The investigator collect follow-up information database hospital and/or telephone call patient . Follow-up include screen major outcome include death ( in-hospital , cardiac non-cardiac ) , non-fatal myocardial infarction , need surgical percutaneous revas¬cularisation . Myocardial infarction define troponin level 99th percentile symptom cardiac ischemia . For patient re-infarction , definition require ≥20 % increase cardiac marker ( Troponin ) ischemic symptom ECG finding angiographic evidence coronary artery occlusion include early stent thrombosis . Early stent thrombosis define acute myocardial infarction due stent thrombosis 30 day implantation , usually index hospitalization . Statistical analysis : The analysis result perform use Predictive Analytics SoftWare ( PASW ) Statistics 18.0 Windows ( Statistical Package Social Sciences , SPSS Inc. , Chicago , Illinois ) . Data test normal distribution use Kolmogorov-Smirnov test . The categorical variable show number case percentage normally distribute continuous variable show mean ± SD . Student 's t-test use analysis continuous variable normally distribute χ2 test categorical variable . The Kruskal-Wallis rank-sum test use variable normally distribute . Statistical significance define p value less 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: Patients underwent primary PCI acute STEMI > 1 lesion culprit artery Presence LMCA lesion Cardiogenic shock Previous CABG operation Decision CABG operation primary PCI Severe valvular disease include aortic stenosis mitral insufficiency Severe kidney disease ( serum creatinine > 2.5 mg/dl patient maintenance hemodialysis ) Rejection second PCI patient index event
